IMPORT_WRONG_LINE_LENGTH.title: Wrong file format
IMPORT_WRONG_LINE_LENGTH.message: On line [{{number}}] in given file is some error.

IMPORT_CANT_READ_FILE_PATH.title: Cannot read file path
IMPORT_CANT_READ_FILE_PATH.message: Can read the file in path [{{path}}]. Please check if you put in right path.

SYSTEM_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTES_NOT_FOUND.title: No schema attributes were found
SYSTEM_SCHEMA_ATTRIBUTES_NOT_FOUND.message: Schema [{{schema}}] on system [{{system}}] have no attributes.

SYSTEM_NAME_NOT_FOUND.title: System was not found
SYSTEM_NAME_NOT_FOUND.message: System [{{system}}] was not found. Please, check if name is right.

CONNECTOR_OBJECT_CLASS_NOT_FOUND.title: Connector object class was not found
CONNECTOR_OBJECT_CLASS_NOT_FOUND.message: Connector object class for system [{{system}}] was not found. Please, check if some schema was generated.

CONNECTOR_CONFIGURATION_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_F.title: Connector was not selected
CONNECTOR_CONFIGURATION_FOR_SYSTEM_NOT_F.message: Connector for system [{{system}}] is not defined. Please, select connector definition in system settings.

CONNECTOR_INSTANCE_NOT_FOUND.title: Connector instance was not found
CONNECTOR_INSTANCE_NOT_FOUND.message: Connector instance for system [{{system}}] was not found. Please, make sure you added right system name.

SET_EAV_TREES_NO_DEFINITION_CODE.title: Property set wrong
SET_EAV_TREES_NO_DEFINITION_CODE.message: Property [{{code}}] is not set or wrongly set. Please check it first.

IDENTITY_ROLE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED.title: You can not edit this role assignment
IDENTITY_ROLE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED.message: Assigned role [{{role}}] you can not edit, you are not her guarantee.

extras-import-codelist.label: Import Code list from CSV
extras-import-codelist.help: Task which will create/update defined code list and it's items from CSV file

eavattributenameprefix.label: Prefix of column with name of EAV attribute

eavattributevalueprefix.label: Prefix of column with value of EAV attribute
